mapper.insert: insert into user(userEmail, userPw, userName, userAddr, userAddrDetail, userAddrEtc) values (#{userEmail},#{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userAddr}, #{userAddrDetail}, #{userAddrEtc})
mapper.select: select count(userEmail) from user where userEmail = #{userEmail}
select * from user where userEmail=#{userEmail} and userPw=#{userPw}
mapper.update: update user set userPw=#{userPw}, userName=#{userName}, userAddr=#{userAddr}, userAddrDetail=#{userAddrDetail}, userAddrEtc=#{userAddrEtc} where userId=#{userId}
